param.name: param.builid
param.spec: text description='Build ID' label='BuildId' validationMode='not_empty' display='prompt'

parameters.param:
BUILD='%param.buildid%'
[[ -d /var/data/catalyst/builds/%Release% ]] || mkdir -p /var/data/catalyst/builds/%Release% cd /var/data/catalyst/builds/%Release%
echo "Cleaning up old hashfiles" for file in "stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc portage-latest.tar.bz2.md5sum portage-latest.tar.bz2.gpgsig" do rm $file done
echo "Fetching hashes" wget -O stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc http://distfiles.gentoo.org/releases/amd64/autobuilds/current-stage3-amd64-hardened/stage3-amd64-hardened-${BUILD}.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc || exit 1 wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2.md5sum || exit 1 wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2.gpgsig || exit 1
[[ -f stage1.spec ]] || wget -O stage1.spec "https://gitweb.gentoo.org/proj/releng.git/plain/releases/weekly/specs/amd64/livecd-stage1.spec"
if [[ -f stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2 ]] && ( grep $(sha512sum stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2|awk '{ print $1 }' ) stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc &> /dev/null ) then echo "Not fetching, file exists and checksums match" else echo "Clobbering stagnant stage" rm stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2 FETCH_STAGE=1 fi
if [[ -f portage-latest.tar.bz2 ]] && ( grep $(md5sum portage-latest.tar.bz2) portage-latest.tar.bz2.md5sum &> /dev/null ) then echo "Not fetching, file exists and checksums match" else FETCH_PORTAGE=1 echo "Clobbering stagnant snapshot" fi
(( FETCH_STAGE == 1 )) && lftp -c pget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/releases/amd64/autobuilds/current-stage3-amd64-hardened/stage3-amd64-hardened-${BUILD}.tar.bz2 -o stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2 (( FETCH_PORTAGE == 1 )) && lftp -c pget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2
sed -i "s/###SNAPSHOT_ID###/"$(date +%Y).$(date +%m).$(date +%d)"/" stage1.spec sudo /usr/bin/catalyst -s "$(date +%Y).$(date +%m).$(date +%d)" sudo /usr/bin/catalyst -f stage1.spec

BUILD='%param.builid%'
[[ -d /var/data/catalyst/builds/%param.release% ]] || mkdir -p /var/data/catalyst/builds/%param.release% cd /var/data/catalyst/builds/%param.release%
[[ -f stage2.spec ]] || wget -O stage2.spec "https://gitweb.gentoo.org/proj/releng.git/plain/releases/weekly/specs/amd64/livecd-stage2.spec"
sudo /usr/bin/catalyst -f stage2.spec

[[ -d /var/tmp/catalyst/builds/%Release% ]] || mkdir -p /var/tmp/catalyst/builds/%Release% cd /var/tmp/catalyst/builds/%Release% wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/releases/amd64/autobuilds/current-stage3-amd64-hardened/stage3-amd64-hardened-20151210.tar.bz2 wget -O portage-latest.tar.bz2 http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2 wget https://gitweb.gentoo.org/proj/releng.git/tree/releases/weekly/specs/amd64/livecd-stage1.spec #sudo catalyst -s "$(date +%Y).$(date +%m).$(date +%d)"
